per_pixel_2=warp = st*1.950*(x-0.5);
per_pixel_3=thresh = above(bass_att,thresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,thresh))*((thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_pixel_4=dx_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dx_r;

per_pixel_6=
per_pixel_7=
per_pixel_8=zoom = zoom + 1.4*(2*dx_r*(1.5*((sin(time)-rad)*sin(8*rad))*2));

per_pixel_12=

per_pixel_18=zoom = zoom + 0.01;
per_pixel_19=zoom = zoom + (0.05 + 0.04*sin(time))*(0.2*sin(ang*time));

per_pixel_21=
